methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the selection and does not copy it to the clipboard.

parameters.name: merge
parameters.description: If true the copy includes all visible layers. If false, copies only from the current layer.

methods.name: copy
methods.description: Copies the selection to the clipboard.

methods.name: cut
methods.description: Cuts the current selection to the clipboard.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the border selection.

methods.name: selectBorder
methods.description: Selects the selection border only (in the specified width); subsequent actions do not affect the selected area within the borders.

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: The amount to contract the selection.

methods.name: contract
methods.description: Contracts the selection.

parameters.name: fillType
parameters.description: The color or history state with which to fill the object.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The color blend mode.

parameters.name: opacity
parameters.description: The opacity as a percentage. Range: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: preserveTransparency
parameters.description: If true, perserves transparencies.

methods.name: fill
methods.description: Fills the selection.

parameters.name: strokeColor
parameters.description: The color to stroke the selection with.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The stroke width.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The stroke location.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The color blend mode.

parameters.name: opacity
parameters.description: The opacity of the stroke color as a percentage. Range: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: preserveTransparency
parameters.description: If true, preserves transparency.

methods.name: stroke
methods.description: Strokes the selection.

methods.name: selectAll
methods.description: Selects the entire layer.

methods.name: deselect
methods.description: Deselects the current selection.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Array of x and y coordinates that describe the corners of the selection, in the format [[x1, y1], [x2,y2],[x3, y3], [x4,y4]]

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The method for combining the new selection with the existing selection.

parameters.name: feather
parameters.description: The feather amount.

parameters.name: antiAlias
parameters.description: If true, anti-aliasing is used.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects the specified region.

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: The amount to expand the selection.

methods.name: expand
methods.description: Expands the selection.

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: The amount to feather the edge.

methods.name: feather
methods.description: Feathers the edges of the selection.

parameters.name: tolerance
parameters.description: The tolerance range. Range: 0 to 255.

parameters.name: antiAlias
parameters.description: If true, anti-aliasing is used.

methods.name: grow
methods.description: Grows the selection to include all adjacent pixels falling within the specified tolerance range.

methods.name: invert
methods.description: Inverts the selection.

parameters.name: tolerance
parameters.description: The tolerance range. Range: 0 to 255.

parameters.name: antiAlias
parameters.description: If true, anti-aliasing is used.

methods.name: similar
methods.description: Grows the selection to include pixels throughout the image falling within the tolerance range.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The sample radius in pixels. Range: 0 to 100.

methods.name: smooth
methods.description: Cleans up stray pixels left inside or outside a color-based selection (within the radius specified in pixels).

parameters.name: into
parameters.description: The channel to save the selection to.

parameters.name: combination
parameters.description: How to add the selection to the existing contents of the channel.

methods.name: store
methods.description: Saves the selection as a channel.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The channel to load the selection from.

parameters.name: combination
parameters.description: How to combine the channel contents with the existing selection.

parameters.name: inverting
parameters.description: If true, selects the inverse of the channel contents.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the selection from the specified channel.

parameters.name: deltaX
parameters.description: The amount to move the object horizontally.

parameters.name: deltaY
parameters.description: The amount to move the object vertically.

methods.name: translate
methods.description: Moves the object relative to its current position.

parameters.name: deltaX
parameters.description: The amount to move the object horizontally.

parameters.name: deltaY
parameters.description: The amount to move the object vertically.

methods.name: translateBoundary
methods.description: Moves the boundary of selection relative to its current position.

parameters.name: angle
parameters.description: The number of degrees to rotate the object.

parameters.name: anchor
parameters.description: The point to rotate about.

methods.name: rotate
methods.description: Rotates the object.

parameters.name: angle
parameters.description: The rotation angle (in degrees)

parameters.name: anchor
parameters.description: The point to rotate about.

methods.name: rotateBoundary
methods.description: Rotates the boundary of the selection.

parameters.name: horizontal
parameters.description: The amount to scale the selection horizontally (as a percentage).

parameters.name: vertical
parameters.description: The amount to scale the selection vertically (as a percentage).

parameters.name: anchor
parameters.description: The point to scale around.

methods.name: resize
methods.description: Resizes the selected area to the specified dimensions and anchor position.

parameters.name: horizontal
parameters.description: The amount to scale the object horizontally (as a percentage).

parameters.name: vertical
parameters.description: The amount to scale the object vertically (as a percentage).

parameters.name: anchor
parameters.description: The point to scale around.

methods.name: resizeBoundary
methods.description: Scales the boundary of the selection.

parameters.name: tolerance
parameters.description: The tolerance in pixels.

methods.name: makeWorkPath
methods.description: Makes this selection item the workpath for this document.

properties.name: typename
properties.description: The class name of the object.

properties.name: bounds
properties.description: The bounding rectangle of the entire selection.

properties.name: solid
properties.description: If true, the bounding rectangle a solid rectangle.

name: Selection
description: The selected area of the document or layer.
